name: smart-attendance-system
description: Complete Smart Attendance System with Face Recognition

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd student-attendance-system/server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "PYTHON,SERVER,CLIENT" -c "yellow,blue,green" "npm run start:python" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "PYTHON,SERVER,CLIENT" -c "yellow,blue,green" "npm run start:python" "cd student-attendance-system/server && npm start" "cd student-attendance-system/client && npm run preview"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd logic && pip install -r requirements.txt
